name: bettercallclaude-onlinekommentar
description: Search and retrieve Swiss legal commentaries (Kommentare) from OnlineKommentar.ch. Part of the BetterCallClaude Swiss Legal Intelligence suite.

tools.name: search_commentaries
tools.description: Search Swiss legal commentaries by keyword, article reference, or legal term

tools.name: get_commentary
tools.description: Get detailed commentary content by ID including full text, authors, and citations

tools.name: get_commentary_for_article
tools.description: Find commentaries for a specific Swiss law article reference (e.g., Art. 97 OR)

tools.name: list_legislative_acts
tools.description: List all available Swiss legislative acts with UUIDs for filtering searches
